nodes.text: Suba was a planet located in the galaxy. The Dressellian smuggler Has Obitt found the Malicious Moondog, a cantina on Suba, no more nastier than the cantina on Rajtiri, the Wanton Wellspring.

Suba was first mentioned in the 2016 canon novel Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel, which was written by James Luceno. The novel served as a prequel to the Star Wars Anthology film, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
